response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its high value and potential impact, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to acquire a product worth significantly more than what you perceive its value to be ($8,000), while also securing a substantial saving compared to the market rate. I look forward to discussing how this product can enhance your operations and contribute to your success. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information.", "product_price": 12000}
